description: Shoreline change projections under different climate scenarios(SSPs). Includes structured sample-wise accretion/erosion and sea level rise (SLR) projections with per-transect median and percentile summaries.

data.title: Shoreline Projections
data.description: Shoreline change projections for global coastal transects, combining accretion/erosion trends and sea level rise impacts with spatial output in point format.

table:columns.name: transect_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for each transect, constructed from coastline, segment, and distance (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: utm_epsg
table:columns.description: EPSG code representing the UTM Coordinate Reference System of the transect (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.description: Bounding box of the transect geometry, defined by minimum and maximum longitude/latitude coordinates (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: Spatial index for the transect origin using the Bing Maps Tile System (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: common_country_name
table:columns.description: Common name of the country where the transect is located (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: continent
table:columns.description: Name of the continent where the transect is located (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:change_rate
table:columns.description: Rate of shoreline change (m/year) derived from satellite-derived shorelines (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:change_rate_std_err
table:columns.description: Standard error of the estimated shoreline change rate (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:reference_datetime
table:columns.description: Reference datetime for the baseline shoreline position (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:reference_lon
table:columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the reference shoreline observation (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:reference_lat
table:columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the reference shoreline observation (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:obs_primary_count
table:columns.description: Count of primary shoreline observations used in the regression model (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: class:shore_type
table:columns.description: Predicted shore type classification (e.g., sandy sediments, rocky formations).

table:columns.name: class:coastal_type
table:columns.description: Predicted coastal geomorphological classification (e.g., cliffed, plain, dune, engineered).

table:columns.name: class:has_defense
table:columns.description: Indicates whether coastal protection structures are present (e.g., seawalls, revetments).

table:columns.name: class:is_built_environment
table:columns.description: Indicates whether the coastal area is part of a built-up or urbanized environment.

table:columns.name: gcc:cs_deltadtm
table:columns.description: Coastal slope computed from depth of closure to coastal max using DeltaDTM elevation data.

table:columns.name: gcc:sjoin_distance
table:columns.description: Distance in meters between the transect and nearest valid GCC slope profile.

table:columns.name: ar6:ssp1-26_2030
table:columns.description: AR6 projected relative sea level rise (m) for SSP1-2.6 in 2030 (100 percentiles).

table:columns.name: ar6:ssp1-26_2050
table:columns.description: AR6 projected relative sea level rise (m) for SSP1-2.6 in 2050 (100 percentiles).

table:columns.name: ar6:ssp1-26_2100
table:columns.description: AR6 projected relative sea level rise (m) for SSP1-2.6 in 2100 (100 percentiles).

table:columns.name: ar6:ssp2-45_2030
table:columns.description: AR6 projected relative sea level rise (m) for SSP2-4.5 in 2030 (100 percentiles).

table:columns.name: ar6:ssp2-45_2050
table:columns.description: AR6 projected relative sea level rise (m) for SSP2-4.5 in 2050 (100 percentiles).

table:columns.name: ar6:ssp2-45_2100
table:columns.description: AR6 projected relative sea level rise (m) for SSP2-4.5 in 2100 (100 percentiles).

table:columns.name: ar6:ssp5-85_2030
table:columns.description: AR6 projected relative sea level rise (m) for SSP5-8.5 in 2030 (100 percentiles).

table:columns.name: ar6:ssp5-85_2050
table:columns.description: AR6 projected relative sea level rise (m) for SSP5-8.5 in 2050 (100 percentiles).

table:columns.name: ar6:ssp5-85_2100
table:columns.description: AR6 projected relative sea level rise (m) for SSP5-8.5 in 2100 (100 percentiles).

table:columns.name: gcc:cs_slope_is_valid
table:columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the coastal slope value is considered valid and reliable.

table:columns.name: sds:change_rate_is_valid
table:columns.description: Boolean flag indicating if the shoreline change rate estimate is statistically valid.

table:columns.name: transect_geometry
table:columns.description: Original transect geometry as a WKT LineString in EPSG:4326.

table:columns.name: ssp
table:columns.description: Selected Shared Socioeconomic Pathway scenario used in the projection (e.g., 'ssp2-45').

table:columns.name: datetime
table:columns.description: Target date of the shoreline projection under the selected scenario.

table:columns.name: ambient_change_mean
table:columns.description: Mean shoreline change due to ambient (non-SLR) trends estimated from historical data.

table:columns.name: ambient_change_p5
table:columns.description: 5th percentile of ambient shoreline change based on uncertainty from the regression model.

table:columns.name: ambient_change_p50
table:columns.description: Median (50th percentile) of ambient shoreline change distribution.

table:columns.name: ambient_change_p95
table:columns.description: 95th percentile of ambient shoreline change distribution.

table:columns.name: slr_retreat
table:columns.description: Simulated shoreline retreat distances due to sea level rise, estimated using the Bruun Rule.

table:columns.name: slr_retreat_p5
table:columns.description: 5th percentile of projected shoreline retreat due to sea level rise.

table:columns.name: slr_retreat_p50
table:columns.description: Median (50th percentile) of projected shoreline retreat due to sea level rise.

table:columns.name: slr_retreat_p95
table:columns.description: 95th percentile of projected shoreline retreat due to sea level rise.

table:columns.name: total_change
table:columns.description: Simulated total shoreline change values, combining ambient change and sea level rise retreat.

table:columns.name: total_change_p5
table:columns.description: 5th percentile of total projected shoreline change (ambient + SLR).

table:columns.name: total_change_p50
table:columns.description: Median of total projected shoreline change (ambient + SLR).

table:columns.name: total_change_p95
table:columns.description: 95th percentile of total projected shoreline change (ambient + SLR).

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Projected shoreline geometry at target datetime, typically as a Point or LineString in EPSG:4326.

sci:citation: Calkoen et al., 2025. Shoreline Projections. Deltares.
title: Global Shoreline Change Projections

geoparquet-stac-items.title: GeoParquet STAC items
geoparquet-stac-items.description: Snapshot of the collection's STAC items exported to GeoParquet format.
